item.description:
What will you be doing at your Meetup?
We'll be meeting at 5PM at Bertucci's (for a bite and a beverage) before the 6:30 presentation of Yaron Brook at the Ford Hall Forum at Faneuil Hall in downtown Boston. Dr. Brook will be discussing Jihad versus the West. I'll email members with details on cost of tickets as the date approaches.

Who should come? Are newcomers welcome?
Anyone interested in Objectivism is welcome. This will be a social gathering, not a study group.

Do members need to bring anything?
An open and active mind is sufficient.

Why should people come?
It's a great opportunity to hear a fabulous speaker on a topic that many of us are not clear about due to the media's and the government's continual spin of the real story. It's also a great opportunity to socialize with others interested in current events as viewed from an Objectivist perspective.

How will members find you when they get there? I'll be wearing cowboy boots.

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: An Evening With Dr. Yaron Brook at the Ford Hall Forum
